name: Rename voice
description: If a voice is unknown, use this to change the voice name as soon as you find out the real name of the speaker. Only call this tool if a voice in unknown or you are directly instructed to by the user.

parameters.name: Current voice name
parameters.description: The current name of the voice you want to rename.

parameters.name: New voice name
parameters.description: What you want to name the voice.
